name: Divine Smite (undead/fiends)
description: Starting at 2nd level, when you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack, you can expend one spell slot to deal radiant damage to the target, in addition to the weaponâ€™s damage. The extra damage is 2d8 for a 1st-level spell slot, plus 1d8 for each spell level higher than 1st, to a maximum of 5d8. The damage increases by 1d8 if the target is an undead or a fiend, to a maximum of 6d8.

name: Hungry Jaws
description: Once per short rest as a bonus action, you can make a bite attack. If it hits, you gain CON modifier (min 1) temporary HP.

name: Great Weapon Master Attack
description: On your turn, when you score a critical hit with a melee weapon or reduce a creature to 0 HP with one, you can make one melee weapon attack as a bonus action.

name: Check Wild Magic
description: Rolls a d20 to see if the Wild Magic Surge occurs.
